attributes.action: Stop the Inland Revenue penalising  anyone monthly without informing them that they are in penalty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment Revenue & Customs are applying penalties for various reasons on a monthly basis without issuing any notification that they are doing so. This is not necessarily for any tax oustanding, it is normally for information not being provided on time.
For example, it would be possible to incure 11 months penalties for not providing a yearly return before you were notified that you had not provided a return. 
This can only be seen as an attempt by  Revenue & Customs to maximise any penalties for what may be a simple adimistrative error.
It cannot be just that a Government Department is seen to create a penalty which it arbitralily applies, which accrues monthly without any notification or reminders. 
Surely these penalties, which might run to many thousands of Pounds, must have at least one reminder issued by the Reveunue after the first months charges have been applied. How else can anyone attempt to correct the situation, which may have been caused by lost post either before it reached the Revenue or within the Revenue's internal post.
